column1: Tookland was a wide region of the Shires Westfarthing that was the historical province of the Took Family
column2: and so of the hereditary Thain of the Shire. The Tookland lay to the south of the East Road
column3: with its chief and central township at Tuckborough in the Green Hills. There
column5: was the famous and historic home of the Tooks
column6: Great Smials. Somewhat to the west of Tuckborough lay the smaller of the Tooklands main settlements
